name: Daisy (Uzelott)
description:
Daisy - GMTK 2022 Game Jam

Tibi used to have a normal childhood. She played with her brother in the nearby daisy fields, like any normal child would do. That is, until one day everything changed.

She found her parents on the living room floor. Covered in blood. Shocked by what she saw she started to look for her brother, the only one left. But he was nowhere to be found. 

The search for her brother lasted almost 10 year, without a trace. Police investigations ceased and Tibi's hope was almost gone. But then she received a mysterious letter. Not a single word, but a clue. A clue that might help her to find her long lost brother once again.
